name: #VIC "Fortress" Protocol
desc:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by shields by %s.
Greatly reduces the chance that shields will be pierced by EMP arcs.
Increases the amount of soft flux the raised shields generate per second by %s
Increases the turn rate of the ship's shields by %s and the rate at which the shields are raised by %s.
Reduces max speed by %s.
Increases 0-flux boost speed bonus by %s.

Incompatible with Hardened Shields and Safety Overrides.

If installed on VIC ships with other modular VIC hullmods (containing VIC prefix in the name) reduces the maximum speed by %s.

name: A-Series "Shturm" Protocol
desc: The A-series a.k.a. "Shturm" line of VIC ships is designed  with a specific set of technological solutions, giving them an edge in frantic close combat. The installation of this hullmod activates said solutions and severely reconfigures the ship's energy and weapon systems.
